title: Total acquires French biogas company
lead: Fonroche Biogaz currently operates seven anaerobic digestion units in France and has four more projects in the pipeline

title: Hitachi Capital UK ‘supercharges’ GRIDSERVE with £10m investment
lead: The partners plan to work together to build the infrastructure needed for the large-scale adoption of electric vehicles in the UK

title: Nearly 40% of Europeans ‘consider ditching air travel the easiest way to fight climate change’
lead: Once Covid-19 restrictions are lifted, nearly 67% of Brits are planning to fly less frequently, according to a new survey

title: EU approves €300m German state aid to support sustainable transport
lead: The budget covers the period from 2020 to 2023 and will support projects aimed at favouring local public transport over more polluting means of transport

title: Paving the way for businesses to start their net zero journey
lead: Sean Langford from SmartestEnergy and Experienced Energy Solutions’ Craig Watson told ELN how sustainably-minded businesses can get started on going green

title: Environment Agency seeks views on new nuclear power station design
lead: The Environment Agency has identified six ‘potential issues’ of the UK Hualong Pressurised Water Reactor

title: New £5m project supports UK’s nuclear waste disposal programme
lead: Testing has started on a new system to seal deep boreholes

title: British Embassy in Algiers seeks bids for climate fund
lead: It intends to support activities in Algeria that focus on raising public awareness about climate change as well as solutions for a green recovery post COVID-19

title: Human activity ‘could drive atmospheric CO2 in 2021 50% higher than pre-industrial levels’
lead: The UK’s national weather service attributes the rise mainly to fossil fuel burning and deforestation

title: Government faces backlash over decision to approve use of ‘bee-killing’ pesticide
lead: The EU had previously imposed a ban on the use of the pesticide
